column5: hey folks,  i was wondering if any of you had fished in cancun, im getting married in june and we are going there for the honeymoon.  i dont care what i catch, i just want to do some fishing while we are there.  my main questions are:  Are you allowed to fish on the beach?  we will be in the hotelzone, i dont plan on fishing during the day while people are swimming, but maybe early mornings and nights.  Do i need a fishing liscence?  Do any of you have a captain that you would recomend for a deep sea trip while we are there?  i have the future wife talked into one day at sea.  thanks,  jason
